name: Zombiefied
description:
After dying by the side effects of a new vaccine, you wake up with the desire to feed on the fresh human brain.

Zombified is a  lowpoly survival adventure in which you are the zombie! You must convert all the humans to your side by biting them. Customize your zombie and unlock new content with your scores!

Cycle through the day and night in the map as you try to convert as many humans as you can before they eradicade you, use your newfound zombie skills to strategize and assist your comrades in this fight! No human must be left standing.

===========================================================

There are two sides fighting for survival in this game, the zombies and the humans. Both sides hold special abilities that only they can do and these change throughout the cycle depending if it's day or night.

===========================================================

Main Features:

  • Interactive UI which shows the current state of the game and challenges the player
  • Different roles, zombies and humans, which can either convert or dash, or attack from a close / far range (or hide during the night) respectfully
  • Functioning interactive AI elements which make each rerun of the game unpredictable and fun
  • Unlockable content for customization
